title: Minimal viable increment
summary: Deliver the smallest production slice that proves the path, then expand through repeatable patterns.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Large programs stall when they wait for the ‘perfect platform’ before shipping.
whenNotToUse: Regulatory or safety constraints require full scope before any release

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Pick an increment that is production-real: security, telemetry, and rollback included.

complexity.rationale: Slicing is hard, but it reduces risk.

realWorldExample.approach: Shipped one low-risk integration end-to-end with full ops, then reused the pattern.
realWorldExample.outcome: Built confidence and accelerated subsequent migrations.
